txt.en: 'And that's a man's skull. Well, I regret this completely.'

Anyâmat holds a shovel aloft as if it were some prize.

'Treasure! I'm always hearing about sailors looking for treasure that's washed ashore.'

They thrust the shovel into your hands.

'I will tell you where to dig. I am a very lucky person and tend to have a good sense for these sorts of things.'
Anyâmat would like to dredge for buried treasure on Baj Khatûg.\n\nBaj Khatûg is an island off the eastern shore of Zamarzîr.
Anyâmat harbours aspirations of being a great shanty-man.
Anyâmat would like to dredge for buried treasure on Baj Khatûg.\n\nBaj Khatûg is an island off the eastern shore of Zamarzîr.
'Do you think this is the owner of the boots?' Anyâmat wonders aloud as she stares at the skull.\n\n'Maybe... that is enough treasure hunting for today.'
Anyâmat would like to dredge for buried treasure on Baj Khatûg.\n\nBaj Khatûg is an island off the eastern shore of Zamarzîr.
'An old boot. Hmm, it doesn't look to be in my size. Do you want it? No?'
'I was sure there'd be something here...'

You've found things that could be considered treasure. Talk to Anyâmat about what to do next.\n\nAnyâmat may be summoned by using Anyâmat's whistle from your inventory. Anyâmat may only be summoned while in and around Zamarzîr.
Anyâmat would like to dredge for buried treasure on Baj Khatûg.\n\nBaj Khatûg is an island off the eastern shore of Zamarzîr.
'Oh another boot! It matches the first one. I wonder what happened to their owner...'
